timeline.author: yangzhg

timeline.bodyText: should check java version after configure initialized? Other wise the config isn't effective
timeline.author: imay

replies.bodyText:
checkJavaVersion() does not, and should not depend on any configurations of the program. It only depends on the java runtime environment, which should already be initialized
when we get here.
replies.author: morningman

timeline.message:
[FE Maven] Change maven repository url from http to https (#2786)

From January 15th, 2020, Requests to http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ return a 501 HTTPS Required status.
So switch central repository url from http to https

first commit

modify script

fix bugs

add runtime version

fs broker

fix ut

fix bug

modify start_fe.sh to choose JAVA_OPTS automatically

timeline.bodyText: I think this function is better to be put in JdkUtils not in PaloFe
timeline.author: imay
